name: copyBytes(to:count:)
desc: Copies the provided number of bytes from the start of the type into a raw memory buffer.Required. Default implementations provided.

items.name: func copyBytes<DestinationType>(to: UnsafeMutableBufferPointer<DestinationType>, count: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Copies the provided number of bytes from the start of the type into a typed memory buffer.

items.name: func copyBytes(to: UnsafeMutableRawBufferPointer, count: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Copies the provided number of bytes from the start of the type into a raw memory buffer.

declaration: @discardableResult func copyBytes(to: UnsafeMutableRawBufferPointer, count: Int) -> Int
